queries: SELECT osm_id, ST_Simplify(way, 4000) AS __geometry__, ref, name, highway, railway, construction, proposed, start_date, opening_date FROM planet_osm_line1 WHERE railway in ('rail', 'construction', 'proposed') or highway in ('motorway', 'trunk') or construction in ('rail', 'motorway', 'trunk') or proposed in ('rail', 'motorway', 'trunk')

SELECT osm_id, ST_Simplify(way, 2000) AS __geometry__, ref, name, highway, railway, construction, proposed, start_date, opening_date FROM planet_osm_line1 WHERE railway in ('rail', 'construction', 'proposed') or highway in ('motorway', 'trunk') or construction in ('rail', 'motorway', 'trunk') or proposed in ('rail', 'motorway', 'trunk')

SELECT osm_id, ST_Simplify(way, 1000) AS __geometry__, status, ref, name, highway, railway, construction, proposed, start_date, opening_date FROM planet_osm_line1 WHERE railway in ('rail', 'construction', 'proposed') or highway in ('motorway', 'trunk') or construction in ('rail', 'motorway', 'trunk') or proposed in ('rail', 'motorway', 'trunk')
SELECT osm_id, ST_Simplify(way,80) AS __geometry__, status, ref, name, highway, railway, construction, proposed, bridge, tunnel, layer, maxspeed, start_date, opening_date FROM planet_osm_line1
